reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Distribution of food baskets to the Rohingya inside Myanmar.

description.narrative: - Providing healthy and clean food that protects families from disease and spread of epidemics and infectious pests - Contribute to achieving food security for the Rohingya in light of the lack of food provided to them - Alleviate the financial burden on families in obtaining basic food - Strengthening the bonds of love and brotherhood among Muslims in the holy month of Ramadan - Compensate the affected families and stand by them under the circumstances they face from violence and purges.
Distribution of 12,143 Food Baskets by Region, Town, Village, Neighborhood or Camp.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
